Today, tourist destinations are opening up again, people are getting vaccinated and life is returning to normal
Planning your trip will require navigation around various travel restrictions
Icon with a sign that says open
Icon of an airplane taking off
Retrieve detailed information on measures in place for a selected country
What are our sources and where to look for more information
We are committed to the open source, learn where you can contribute yourself

Data is pulled from Reopen Europa API. As per their own disclaimer on the unreliability of the service: The information on this page is not exhaustive. It is based on the most recent available data provided by EU Member States and collected from other publicly available and authoritative national sources. While the Commission seeks to keep the information up to date, we take no responsibility of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness and accuracy of the information contained in this page or individual decisions based thereon.
Where can I get more info?
There are a few ways on reaching out. First, you can check the official Reopen Europa website, you can check the GitHub repository or contact developers directly.
